extendedInfo.description: Let your phone count you down to the Christmas and the New Year!'3D Christmas Live Wallpaper' is a stunning 3D live wallpaper featuring a sparkling animated Christmas Tree of Light, and an exciting Countdown to Christmas and the New Year.This version also features a Happy New Year scene with fireworks, a super realistic 3D Snow Scene, a magical Sky Lanterns scene to celebrate the Chinese / Lunar New Year, plus a bonus Valentine's day scene, and by popular demand a dedicated Fireworks scene! (That's 7-Wallpapers-in-1!)All scenes come with countless customization options, can be enjoyed both as a live wallpaper background or as a fully interactive foreground app where you can look around freely, and quickly customise your settings.This version contains *lots* of extra features and personalisation options:â Christmas Tree scene (with 5 animated camera motions)â Countdown scene (Countdown to Christmas, New Year's Countdown, and more!)â Happy New Year scene (with fireworks!)â 3D Snow scene (day or night)â Sky Lanterns sceneâ Fireworks sceneâ Valentine's Day sceneâ The ability to choose any combination of your favourite scenes above for rotation.â A range of vibrant colour schemes, with a beautiful colour cycling mode that sweeps through all the colours of the rainbow.â Gorgeous glowing background light or flare spotlight with shimmering sunbeams.â Choose your favourite camera angles and 3D animation fly-bys.â Snowfall amount and speed.â Additional tree lights.â Exciting 3D Fireworks!â HD options to increase display quality. Great for tablets!â Lots of performance options to help run smoothly and save battery power.â 32-bit colour mode for smoother colours.â Option to count down in either rounded-up days (the traditional days-to-Christmas method), or a fully accurate and nail-biting Days, Hours, Minutes and Seconds method.â Screen positioning and zoom options.â and lots lots more to play with!Have Fun! :)We're absolutely thrilled with the phenomenal response we've had since our first release. Thank you all for the wonderful comments! If you've enjoyed the free version, please consider showing your support for our hard work by purchasing this full version which has many more features to enjoy.If you have any problems, please contact us at support@jetblacksoftware.com, and we will help you directly. Thanks!

reviews.title: Christmas live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Simple, elegant, wonderful, can\'t wait to use it nxt year. Best Christmas live wallpaper ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never gets old!
reviews.comment: Here we are, middle of the year, nowhere near Christmas and I can STILL use this lwp for the fireworks for 4th of July! Probably the best one I have ever purchased! Now we just need a four leaf clover for St Patty\'s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 3d Christmas tree
reviews.comment: it is the best app that I found for my needs. I have a Christmas ornament for my tree that does the countdown as well. I wanted 1 for my phone.  Thank You!!!
reviews.author: Gordon Galbraith

reviews.title: Free is good, BUT paid version is well worth the money!
reviews.comment: This is the absolute best wallpaper 4 tablets!  The free version gets it done, BUT the paid version is well worth the money.  I am in the travel industry and people always comment on how nice the wallpaper looks.   Motorola Zoom user.
reviews.author: Norman Defore

reviews.title: 3-D Live Christmas Tree Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Works beautifully for countdown to Christmas, has lots of embellishments to play with. However, the New Year\'s Countdown never worked. It just said, Happy 2013\" from the time I changed the wallpaper the day after Christmas until now, (Jan. 4th).The next option s Valentine\'s Day, but since it\'s over a month awmany, I think I\'ll get a different wallpaper.
reviews.author: Janet Ciaramitaro

reviews.title: Spectacular theme
reviews.comment: But would like to see more holidays included! Still worth the $$.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just beautiful.
reviews.comment: This is such a wonderful app. Fantastic scenes and even a count down. Thanks I love it.
reviews.author: Catherine Ras

reviews.title: 3d Live Christmas
reviews.comment: I loved the wallpaper BUT when I purchased it there was an indicatu on that it also has a countdown to new years which, if is true, I could not find.
reviews.author: Kathy Smith

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. No bugs. Incredible amount of modifications possible. Just great!
reviews.author: Bj\303\270rn Scharloo

reviews.title: Like this one
reviews.comment: Multi coloured lights would make it better perhaps
reviews.author: Di J

reviews.comment: Nice live wallpaper.  Enjoy the changing to fireworks etc.
reviews.author: Steve Strand

reviews.title: Great Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Would be 5 Stars if you could customize holidays. Include birthdays and anniversaries!
reviews.author: Nick Berdeguez

reviews.title: LOVED IT!!
reviews.comment: I love this live wallpaper wish it had more to it such as themes and things to countdown instead of just Christmas, New years, and Valentines day but its great love the color schemes and things just a great live wallpaper period.
reviews.author: Mark Thomas

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Makes it feel like Christmas in the middle of summer!
reviews.author: Denice Wrinkle

reviews.title: Stunning
reviews.comment: I totally love this wallpaper, loads of settings so don\'t have to have it too flashy, i just have tree turning & changing colour and it looks stunning. I\'m sad christmas is over and have to wait another year to see it but the heart (valentine option) is a nice replacement for all year round,  it would be nice if they added other options too like maybe butterflies floating around the screen changing colour (thats a big hint lol) i\'d actually pay a lot more for this wallpaper than what it was as it\'s so good
reviews.author: Tracy M

reviews.title: One of the best!
reviews.comment: Def. worth the price for the paid version!  Hands down, one of the best live wallpapers out there!  The falling snow scene is so realistic, it\'s the best one available too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dead good
reviews.comment: V Christmassy and much classier than other similar live wallpapers.
reviews.author: Kevin Griffiths

reviews.title: 3D Christmas
reviews.comment: I instled this last yr. Too . Very pretty & great affects . I give it 10 christmas stars . Wonderful job .
reviews.author: Kenneth Nootbaar

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This app is so good
reviews.author: Sophie Akram

reviews.title: Live Christmas tree
reviews.comment: I really liked everything about this app, its not only a Christmas countdown but if u purchased the app its also a countdown for New Year\'s.haa..
reviews.author: Sonu Singh
